categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars drafts

nodes.text: The Seer was an old, gray robed, man Luke Starkiller encountered in Mos Eisley, on Utapau. He sat in front of the Mos Eisley Cantina and assured the puzzled Luke that he would find the help he sought getting to Ogana Major, and that the "Son of the Suns" would free everyone.
The Seer partially spoke in rhythmic couplets.
